name: ChronicHeartFailureCHF_ICD9
title: Chronic Heart Failure (CHF)_ICD9
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for CHF Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute CHF Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CHF Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: CHF ICD9 Codes that constitute the Primary CHF Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
